Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2002 WEST WAHALLA LANE, PHOENIX, Arizona, 85027, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Knight-Swift Transportation is by far the largest asset-based full-truckload carrier in the United States. About 80% of revenue derives from asset-based truckload shipping operations (including for-hire dry van, refrigerated, and dedicated contract). The remainder stems from truck brokerage and other asset-light logistics services (8%), as well as intermodal (8%), which uses the Class-I railroads for the underlying movement of the firm's shipping containers and also offers drayage services.
